languages.text: "Интересно..." {n}На лице дознавателя появляется странное выражение — стоического терпения и мрачного веселья.{/n} "Сколько еще подобных ему бродит по палубам в ожидании, когда новые хозяева отдадут им команду?.. По крайней мере, у них, видимо, нет способа удаленной связи. Слабое, но утешение".

traits.locale_text: "Интересно..." {n}На лице дознавателя появляется странное выражение — стоического терпения и мрачного веселья.{/n} "Сколько еще подобных ему бродит по палубам в ожидании, когда новые хозяева отдадут им команду?.. По крайней мере, у них, видимо, нет способа удаленной связи. Слабое, но утешение".

languages.text: "Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."
languages.original_text: "Интересно..." {n}На лице дознавателя появляется странное выражение — стоического терпения и мрачного веселья.{/n} "Сколько еще подобных ему бродит по палубам в ожидании, когда новые хозяева отдадут им команду?.. По крайней мере, у них, видимо, нет способа удаленной связи. Слабое, но утешение".

traits.locale_text: "Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

"Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

languages.text: 「なるほど…」{n}インテロゲイターは冷静な苦痛と厳格なユーモアとも言えるような、奇妙な表情を浮かべた。{/n}「彼のように新しい主人の命令を待って甲板を歩き回っている者は、あと何人いるのだろうか？少なくとも、彼らは遠隔通信の手段を持っていない。大した意味はないが、それでも多少は安心できる」
languages.original_text: "Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: 「なるほど…」{n}インテロゲイターは冷静な苦痛と厳格なユーモアとも言えるような、奇妙な表情を浮かべた。{/n}「彼のように新しい主人の命令を待って甲板を歩き回っている者は、あと何人いるのだろうか？少なくとも、彼らは遠隔通信の手段を持っていない。大した意味はないが、それでも多少は安心できる」

languages.text: “真有趣……”{n}海因里希脸上露出了古怪的表情，既带着坚忍，都带着冷峻的幽默感。{/n}“还有多少像他这样的人在甲板上游荡，等待他们的新主人给他们传达命令？不过至少，他们没有任何远程通信手段。这是个小小的安慰，但总归是个安慰。”
languages.original_text: "Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: “真有趣……”{n}海因里希脸上露出了古怪的表情，既带着坚忍，都带着冷峻的幽默感。{/n}“还有多少像他这样的人在甲板上游荡，等待他们的新主人给他们传达命令？不过至少，他们没有任何远程通信手段。这是个小小的安慰，但总归是个安慰。”

languages.text: «Interesante...». {n}El rostro del Interrogador adopta una expresión curiosa, una mezcla de estoicismo y humor sombrío.{/n} «Me pregunto cuántos como él vagan ahora por las cubiertas, esperando órdenes de sus nuevos amos. Por lo menos no tienen forma de comunicarse a distancia. Es parco consuelo, pero sigue siendo algo».
languages.original_text: "Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: «Interesante...». {n}El rostro del Interrogador adopta una expresión curiosa, una mezcla de estoicismo y humor sombrío.{/n} «Me pregunto cuántos como él vagan ahora por las cubiertas, esperando órdenes de sus nuevos amos. Por lo menos no tienen forma de comunicarse a distancia. Es parco consuelo, pero sigue siendo algo».

languages.text: « Intéressant... » {n}Le visage de l'interrogateur adopte une expression étrange, entre endurance stoïque et humour noir.{/n} « Combien d'autres comme lui arpentent les ponts en attendant un ordre de leurs nouveaux maîtres ? Au moins, ils n'ont pas la possibilité de communiquer à distance... Une bien maigre consolation, mais une consolation tout de même. »
languages.original_text: "Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant... » {n}Le visage de l'interrogateur adopte une expression étrange, entre endurance stoïque et humour noir.{/n} « Combien d'autres comme lui arpentent les ponts en attendant un ordre de leurs nouveaux maîtres ? Au moins, ils n'ont pas la possibilité de communiquer à distance... Une bien maigre consolation, mais une consolation tout de même. »

languages.text: "Interessant ..." {n}Das Gesicht des Interrogators nimmt einen seltsamen Ausdruck an – stoisches Erdulden und grimmiger Humor.{/n} "Wie viele wie er durchstreifen wohl die Decks und warten auf einen Befehl ihrer neuen Meister? Wenigstens kann man sie nicht fernsteuern. Nur ein kleiner Trost, aber immerhin."
languages.original_text: "Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "Interessant ..." {n}Das Gesicht des Interrogators nimmt einen seltsamen Ausdruck an – stoisches Erdulden und grimmiger Humor.{/n} "Wie viele wie er durchstreifen wohl die Decks und warten auf einen Befehl ihrer neuen Meister? Wenigstens kann man sie nicht fernsteuern. Nur ein kleiner Trost, aber immerhin."

languages.text: "İlginç." {n}Sorgucu'nun yüzünde tuhaf bir ifade; dışa yansımayan bir hüzün ve dibe gömülmüş bir hoşnutluk beliriyor.{/n} "Kim bilir güvertelerde dolanıp yeni efendilerinin onlara emir vermesini bekleyen bunun gibi daha kaç kişi vardır... En azından uzaktan irtibata geçebilme imkânları yok. Küçük de olsa bir teselli."
languages.original_text: "Interesting..." {n}The Interrogator's face takes on a strange expression — stoic sufferance and grim humour.{/n} "How many more like him are roaming the decks waiting for their new masters to give them an order? At least they do not have any means of remote communication. A small comfort, but comfort nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "İlginç." {n}Sorgucu'nun yüzünde tuhaf bir ifade; dışa yansımayan bir hüzün ve dibe gömülmüş bir hoşnutluk beliriyor.{/n} "Güvertelerde dolanıp yeni efendilerinin onlara emir vermesini bekleyen bunun gibi daha kaç kişi vardır kim bilir? En azından uzaktan irtibata geçebilme imkânları yok. Küçük de olsa bir teselli."
